title: typo/design events in London 1st-8th November '08?
content:
anyone know of event/seminar/workshop on typography or magazine design in London or Brighton in these dates? i will be visiting and i hope to be lucky in catching any event like that...

also if you guys have any recommendations/links on what places to visit that have typographic/design importance! i would appreciate it :)

its my first time visiting...

thanks a lot and cheers to all :)

b/..

 [‹ This Stroke font... not beamie](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210105439/http:/typophile.com/node/50114 "Go to previous forum topic") [What's wrong with the "Bravefont" spoof movie trailer for Extensis Suitcase Fusion 2 :) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210105439/http:/typophile.com/node/50239 "Go to next forum topic")
author: b

comments.content:
Hi Bas,

there’s a one-day conference on Friday 7 November, at [St. Bride Printing Library](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210105439/http:/typophile.com/wiki/St.%252BBride%252BPrinting%252BLibrary): [Letterpress: a celebration](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210105439/http:/stbride.org/events/letterpress).  
F

And even if you decide not to go to the conference on Friday, St Bride is absolutely worth a visit during its regular hours: Tuesday through Thursday, noon until 5:30 (open until 9 on Wednesday). They really have an astonishing collection of books and other stuff.
